slides.description: Become part of a fast-growing area of the crypto world. You are the only person who can access your crypto assets.
slides.title: Get Started with Blockchain

slides.description: Store, manage and receive interest on your digital assets balance, easily and securely.
slides.title: Wallet

slides.description: Trade quickly and securely. You retain complete control over your funds when trading them on our decentralised exchange.
slides.title: Decentralised Exchange

slides.description: Issue your own tokens. These can be integrated into your business not only as an internal currency but also as a token for decentralised voting, as a rating system, or loyalty program.
slides.title: Token Launcher

openViaDesktop: I would like always to open links via Desktop app

aug2019.text: Traders can sell tokens quickly at market price.
aug2019.title: Market order

dec2018.text: The new mobile app offers a fantastic DEX UI and gateway integration.
dec2018.text_2: Tickers and logos on DEX show approved assets, giving users a high degree of confidence.
dec2018.title: Mobile app 2.0

feb2017.text: The first version of the flagship built-in exchange is launched.
feb2017.title: Hashgreed DEX Beta

feb2018.text: The standalone Client for macOS, Linux and Windows is released.
feb2018.title: Desktop app

jan2019.text: Support for trading on Hashgreed DEX with Smart Accounts is enabled.
jan2019.text_2: Launch of Bitcoin Satoshi Vision gateway
jan2019.title: Smart Account Trading

jul2018.text: The relaunched exchange offers a better UX and performance than any other DEX on the market.
jul2018.text_2: The popular wallet comes out of beta with a major new release.
jul2018.title: New DEX

jul2019.text: Addition of ERC20 token gateway to the Waves ecosystem, meaning that popular Ethereum tokens can be traded on the platform.
jul2019.text_2: Developers have simplified mobile development processes and gain comprehensive descriptions for means of interacting with the Waves blockchain.
jul2019.text_3: Users have the ability to switch easily between multiple accounts within one wallet app.
jul2019.title: ERC-20 Gateway
jul2019.title_2: Mobile SDK and JS library improvement

jun2019.text: Improvements in DEX speed and memory requirements to be implemented.
jun2019.title: DEX optimisation

may2018.text: The relaunched exchange offers a better UX and performance than any other DEX on the market.
may2018.title: Dash & Bitcoin Cash gateways

nov2018.text: Users gain the ability to trade with multi-signature and scripted accounts.
nov2018.title: Smarts Account Support

sep2018.text: Integration with Waves DEX enables users to trade with maximum security.
sep2018.title: Ledger Nano S

sep2019.text: Two factor authentication gives Waves DEX users even greater security.
sep2019.title: 2FA

welcome.tokenomicaToasterText: Become a shareholder of the first-ever all-in-one platform for issuance and trading of tokenized assets.
welcome.tradeOnWaves: Trade on the Hashgreed Decentralised Exchange
welcome.tradeOnWavesDescription: Your wallet credentials are in your control—your keys, your funds.By owning these Nigeria SEC-registered tokens, you own real assets on the ground. Trade, own, and manage a diverse portfolio of RWA assets in key Nigerian locations. HNGN is the stablecoin Naira token in the Krosscoin Ecosystem, used for exit liquidity—users can convert to Fiat Naira anytime by contacting us. The tokens listed are asset-backed, SEC-registered, and may be frozen for safety, recovery, or regulatory enforcement—only KSS coin is non-freezable. Low, fixed fees: 0.0725% and 0.003 KSS per order filled (includes SEC, VAT, and Hashgreed DEX fees).
